author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of the World Water Day, 10 saplings were planted on the campus of Government Higher Secondary School, Jangalapalli. The students also took out a rally to create awareness of water conservation.

The school’s headmaster S. Muraleedar, in his address, said water resources were dwindling day by day, while requirement was on the increase. About 400 students and teachers participated.
title: Saplings planted
